title: Workflow for Generating Intelligent Textbooks
description: Interactive infographic MicroSim of the workflow used in intelligent book creation
subject: Mathematics
author: Dan McCreary
learningObjectives: Understand the mathematical concept of workflow for generating intelligent textbooks
Apply workflow for generating intelligent textbooks to solve problems
Visualize and interpret workflow for generating intelligent textbooks relationships
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on workflow for generating intelligent textbooks
